nodes.text: Hallway 328 was a hallway on the Invisible Hand where Supreme Chancellor Palpatine, Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Anakin Skywalker were detained by ray shields during the Battle of Coruscant. The trio, alongside R2-D2, were subsequently captured by Grievous's troops, made up of two droidekas, multiple OOM security battle droids, and B2 super battle droids.

The non-canon deleted scene "The Death of a Jedi" was played in Hallway 328. In the scene, General Grievous and a battalion of his battle droids encounter Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker who witness the execution of Shaak Ti shortly thereafter.
